Detailed Description

Base class for different kinds of regularization. Implement some subset of the forward/backward propagation methods, which are automatically called by layers.

Definition at line 42 of file lbann_regularizer.hpp.

virtual void lbann::regularizer::fp_activations (  )  [inline, virtual]

Forward propagation regularization of activations. This is called after applying a layer's nonlinearity. Example: Dropout.

Reimplemented in lbann::dropout.

Definition at line 66 of file lbann_regularizer.hpp.

00066 {}

virtual void lbann::regularizer::fp_connections (  )  [inline, virtual]

Forward-propagation regularization of incoming connections. This is called before applying a layer's linearity. Example: DropConnect.

Definition at line 49 of file lbann_regularizer.hpp.

00049 {}

virtual void lbann::regularizer::fp_weights (  )  [inline, virtual]

Forward propagation regularization of weights. This is called after applying a layer's linearity and before its nonlinearity. Example: L2 normalization.

Definition at line 58 of file lbann_regularizer.hpp.
